mapper.select: select * from wishlist where member_num = #{memberNum} order by wishlist_date, goods_num
mapper.update: merge into wishlist w using (select goods_num from goods where goods_num = #{goodsNum}) g on (w.goods_num = g.goods_num and w.member_num = #{memberNum}) when matched then update set wishlist_date = sysdate delete where w.goods_num = #{goodsNum} and w.member_num = #{memberNum} when not matched then insert (w.member_num, w.goods_num, w.wishlist_date) values (#{memberNum}, #{goodsNum}, sysdate)
